languages.text: "Едва ли. За то время, что мы тут торчим, я уже изучил всех и каждого в очереди. Впрочем, бдительность не бывает излишней — как арбитр я могу провести внеплановую проверку документов. Хоть какая-то будет польза от того, что мы застряли здесь".
languages.translation_comment: по стопу сыграть сценку — Соломон стоит с собакой реди людей и дважды баркает

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Этого не будет. Не на моей службе".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.translation_comment: по стопу сыграть сценку — Соломон стоит с собакой реди людей и дважды баркает

languages.text: "Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."
languages.original_text: "Едва ли. За то время, что мы тут торчим, я уже изучил всех и каждого в очереди. Впрочем, бдительность не бывает излишней — как арбитр я могу провести внеплановую проверку документов. Хоть какая-то будет польза от того, что мы застряли здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."

"Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."

languages.text: "Unwahrscheinlich. Während wir hier stehen, habe ich alle Personen in der Schlange beurteilt. Andererseits kann man nie wachsam genug sein ... als Arbitrator kann ich unangekündigt ihre Papiere überprüfen. Vielleicht hat es ja doch etwas Gutes, dass wir hier festsitzen."
languages.original_text: "Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."

traits.locale_text: "Unwahrscheinlich. Während wir hier stehen, habe ich alle Personen in der Schlange beurteilt. Andererseits kann man nie wachsam genug sein ... als Arbitrator kann ich unangekündigt ihre Papiere überprüfen. Vielleicht hat es ja doch etwas Gutes, dass wir hier festsitzen."

languages.text: « J'en doute fort. Depuis notre arrivée, j'ai jaugé chacun des individus présents ici. Cela dit, on n'est jamais trop prudent. En tant qu'arbitrator, je peux effectuer une vérification imprévue des papiers d'identité. Au moins, cette attente interminable servira à quelque chose. »
languages.original_text: "Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."

traits.locale_text: « J'en doute fort. Depuis notre arrivée, j'ai jaugé chacun des individus présents ici. Cela dit, on n'est jamais trop prudent. En tant qu'arbitrator, je peux effectuer une vérification imprévue des papiers d'identité. Au moins, cette attente interminable servira à quelque chose. »

languages.text: “不太可能。等待的这段时间里，我已经评估过了每个排队的人。不过身为法务官，就算再怎么警惕都不为过。我可以对所有人的身份文件进行一场突击检查，这样即便被困在这里，也不完全是在浪费时间。”
languages.original_text: "Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."

traits.locale_text: “不太可能。等待的这段时间里，我已经评估过了每个排队的人。不过身为法务官，就算再怎么警惕都不为过。我可以对所有人的身份文件进行一场突击检查，这样即便被困在这里，也不完全是在浪费时间。”

languages.text: «Es poco probable. En el tiempo que llevamos aquí, he evaluado a todos los individuos de la cola. Dicho eso, no hay vigilancia en exceso: como Arbitrator, puedo realizar una comprobación no programada de la documentación de identidad. Al menos se puede sacar algo de provecho de esta espera».
languages.original_text: "Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."

traits.locale_text: «Es poco probable. En el tiempo que llevamos aquí, he evaluado a todos los individuos de la cola. Dicho eso, no hay vigilancia en exceso: como Arbitrator, puedo realizar una comprobación no programada de la documentación de identidad. Al menos se puede sacar algo de provecho de esta espera».

languages.text: 「可能性は低いでしょう。ここで立っている間に、列にいる全員を評価済みです。とはいえ、警戒しすぎるということはありません。アービトレイターとして、抜き打ちで身分証確認を行うこともできます。ここで足止めされていることも、少しは役に立つかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."

traits.locale_text: 「可能性は低いでしょう。ここで立っている間に、列にいる全員を評価済みです。とはいえ、警戒しすぎるということはありません。アービトレイターとして、抜き打ちで身分証確認を行うこともできます。ここで足止めされていることも、少しは役に立つかもしれません」

languages.text: "Pek düşük. Burada bulunduğumuz süre boyunca kuyruktaki her bir kimseyi değerlendirdim. Fazla tedbirden zarar gelmez tabii. Yargıcı olarak kimlik belgelerini programsız bir şekilde kontrol edebilirim. En azından burada sıkışıp kalmış olmamın bir faydasını görürüz."
languages.original_text: "Unlikely. In the time we've been standing here, I've assessed every individual in the queue. Then again, one can never be too vigilant — as an Arbitrator, I can perform an unscheduled check of identity documents. At least some good can come out of being stuck here."

traits.locale_text: "Pek düşük. Burada bulunduğumuz süre boyunca kuyruktaki her bir kimseyi değerlendirdim. Fazla tedbirden zarar gelmez tabii. Yargıcı olarak kimlik belgelerini programsız bir şekilde kontrol edebilirim. En azından burada sıkışıp kalmış olmamın bir faydasını görürüz."
